I lost a wife once. It was at a mall in Annapolis, MD. USA. I searched and searched and searched for her. More then three hours! With other people helping me. But it was no use. We didn't find. 

Finally I gave up and decided to go home to celebrate. And there she was. She had been home already for almost two hours. Worse day of my life.
